unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Brand Collabs Galore!**
normalised: **Social Media and Influencer Marketing: Brand Collaborations Galore!**

unnormalised: Hey Insta fam! Ever feel like you're seeing more brand collabs than ever before? You're not wrong! From local chai brands hooking up with YouTube artists to massive clothing labels teaming up with Bollywood royalty, influencer marketing is BOOMING in India.
normalised: Hey Insta fam! Ever feel like you're seeing more brand collaborations than ever before? You're not wrong! From local chai brands hooking up with YouTube artists to massive clothing labels teaming up with Bollywood royalty, influencer marketing is booming in India.

unnormalised: Think of it: Deepika Padukone showing off the new Tanishq collection, or Bhuvan Bam trying out a new biryani recipe from ITC. Smart, right?
normalised: Think of it: Deepika Padukone showing off the new Tanishq collection, or Bhuvan Bam trying out a new biryani recipe from I T C. Smart, right?

unnormalised: We're seeing collabs everywhere - health and wellness, fashion, even tech! Remember when that fitness influencer from Delhi promoted that online language learning app? Genius!
normalised: We're seeing collaborations everywhere - health and wellness, fashion, even tech! Remember when that fitness influencer from Delhi promoted that online language learning app? Genius!

unnormalised: But are these partnerships authentic or just paid promotions? That's the million-rupee question! Some are a perfect match, like that Onam collab between the flower delivery service and the Kerala-based food blogger. Others... not so much.
normalised: But are these partnerships authentic or just paid promotions? That's the million-rupee question! Some are a perfect match, like that Onam collaboration between the flower delivery service and the Kerala-based food blogger. Others... not so much.

unnormalised: Experts say the key is genuine alignment between the brand and the influencer's values. Consumers are savvy – they can spot a forced ad from 10 km away!
normalised: Experts say the key is genuine alignment between the brand and the influencer's values. Consumers are savvy – they can spot a forced ad from ten kilometer away!

unnormalised: So, what's the next big trend? Micro-influencers and hyper-local collaborations! Think your neighborhood dosa vendor partnering with a local Instagram food reviewer. Keep your eyes peeled!
normalised: So, what's the next big trend? Micro-influencers and hyper-local collaborations! Think your neighborhood dosa vendor partnering with a local Instagram food reviewer. Keep your eyes peeled!
